title: 1909-11 T206 Johnny Evers WITH BAT, CUBS ON SHIRT PIEDMONT 150 PSA 6-SOLD
author: imdaman1964

posts.post_title: 1909-11 T206 Johnny Evers WITH BAT, CUBS ON SHIRT PIEDMONT 150 PSA 6-SOLD
posts.post_content:
Widely regarded as the most obscure subjects of the three Johnny Evers T206 poses. 
Only been bested by a mere 7 Piedmont examples listed on the PSA "Pop" chart, with only 2 other Piedmont specimens reflecting the PSA 6 assessment.

Near-perfect horizontal centering, with the "side-to-side" positioning revealing a significant partiality towards the left edge (most likely preventing a "NM/7" assessment). Snow-like borders, relatively clean surfaces, four uniform right-angled corners and a super bold Piedmont Cigarettes verso

The last PSA 6 to sell was via PWCC last Dec for $2,750

Will deliver priority ship for SOLD via PP F&F 

Thanks
Wayne
